bibl.title: The Bronzes of Ptolemy II Philadelphus. (Ägypten und Altes Testament. 77.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. The Dattari Bronze Rider, New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art 55.11.11. - II. Two British Museum Bronzes, 38442 and 38443. - III. Bronze Portrait Heads and Busts Attributed to Ptolemy II Philadelphus [Naples, Museo Archeologico Nazionale 5600; - Brooklyn Museum of Arts 63.185; - Paris, Louvre Ma 3261 and New Haven, Yale University, Peabody Museum of Natural History YPM.264259; - Appliqué busts from Pompeii and Delos]. - IV. Egyptian Bronzes of Ptolemy II. - Appendix: The Origin of Ptolemaic Wrestlers' / Pancratiasts' Groups. - Index.
